My daughter is getting married and so I thought Id try to sell a couple cards..

1. 1909-11 T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 60 Sweet Caporal back 350 factory 24..  ----SOLD----
2. 1909-11 T206 Ty Cobb GAI 3 Orange Variation! Polar Bear Back!
Asking $1500 

Email me if you are interested at [url]mikemccullough@netins.net[/url]
